# Delta â€” Persistent Memory Extension

SQLite-backed persistent memory for Pi coding agent. Provides key-value storage, episodic events with tags, project notes loaded at session start, and a full-text memory index across all types.

## Architecture

16 tools organized as: KV(3), Episodic(3), Notes(5), Index(2), Info(1), Version(2). Database is per-project and per-branch at `~/.local/share/pi-ext-delta/`. Injects `<delta_memory>` block into system prompt with active notes, index summary, and stats.

## Files

- [README](docs/README.md): User documentation, tools, schemas, examples
- [ARCHITECTURE](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): Module structure, data flow, DB schema, storage
- [AGENTS](AGENTS.md): Agent instructions

## Key Modules

- `src/index.ts`: Extension factory, event handlers, prompt builders
- `src/db.ts`: SQLite operations, schema init, all queries
- `src/tools.ts`: 16 tool definitions with TypeBox schemas
